notifications.you_will_not_be_auto_subscribed_to_this_: You will not be auto-subscribed to this organization's surveys anymore!

profile.confirm_delete_account: Delete your account with all of your personal information and data
profile.organization_identification: Assist your organization in identifying you on Formbricks
profile.please_enter_email_to_confirm_account_de: Please enter {email} in the following field to confirm the definitive deletion of your account:

profile.org_ownership_transfer: If you are the owner of an organization with other admins, the ownership of that organization will be transferred to another admin.
profile.org_deletion_warning: If you are the only member of an organization or there is no other admin present, the organization will be irreversibly deleted along with all associated data.
